author: ebourg
msg: Changed the eol-style of the test file to fix testReadPosixTar and testReadGnuTar on Unix systems

author: jeremias
msg: Regression fix for empty pages caused by multiple collapsible breaks.
No more empty block areas if a break-before occurs on the first child of an FO to match the behaviour of tables and other FO implementations (clarification by XSL WG pending).
Added an accessor interface for break-before/-after to avoid long if..else lists in BlockStackingLayoutManager.

author: jvermillard
msg: AbstractPollingIoAcceptor javadoced finalized, TODO tag removed

author: ningjiang
msg: Try to fix the test failure of DumpToXmlTest
